verses.verse: Therefore, <WG5620> my beloved <WG27> brethren <WG80> whom <WG1973> I long <WG1973> [to see], my joy <WG5479> and crown, <WG4735> so <WG3779> stand <WG4739> firm <WG4739> in the Lord, <WG2962> my beloved. <WG27>
I urge <WG3870> Euodia <WG2136> and I urge <WG3870> Syntyche <WG4941> to live <WG5426> in harmony <WG5426> in the Lord. <WG2962>

Indeed, <WG3483> true <WG1103> comrade, <WG4805> I ask <WG2065> you also <WG2532> to help <WG4815> these <WG3778> women <WG846> who <WG3748> have shared <WG4866> my struggle <WG4866> in [the cause of] the gospel, <WG2098> together <WG3326> with Clement <WG2815> also, <WG2532> and the rest <WG3062> of my fellow <WG4904> workers, <WG4904> whose <WG3739> names <WG3686> are in the book <WG976> of life. <WG2222>
Rejoice <WG5463> in the Lord <WG2962> always; <WG3842> again <WG3825> I will say, <WG3004> rejoice! <WG5463>
Let your forbearing <WG1933> [spirit] be known <WG1097> to all <WG3956> men. <WG444> The Lord <WG2962> is near. <WG1451>

Be anxious <WG3309> for nothing, <WG3367> but in everything <WG3956> by prayer <WG4335> and supplication <WG1162> with thanksgiving <WG2169> let your requests <WG155> be made <WG1107> known <WG1107> to God. <WG2316>

And the peace <WG1515> of God, <WG2316> which surpasses <WG5242> all <WG3956> comprehension, <WG3563> shall guard <WG5432> your hearts <WG2588> and your minds <WG3540> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>

Finally, <WG3062> brethren, <WG80> whatever <WG3745> is true, <WG227> whatever <WG3745> is honorable, <WG4586> whatever <WG3745> is right, <WG1342> whatever <WG3745> is pure, <WG53> whatever <WG3745> is lovely, <WG4375> whatever <WG3745> is of good <WG2163> repute, <WG2163> if <WG1487> there is any <WG5100> excellence <WG703> and if <WG1487> anything <WG5100> worthy <WG1868> of praise, <WG1868> let your mind <WG3049> dwell <WG3049> on these <WG3778> things. <WG3778>

The things <WG3739> you have learned <WG3129> and received <WG3880> and heard <WG191> and seen <WG3708> in me, practice <WG4238> these <WG3778> things; <WG3778> and the God <WG2316> of peace <WG1515> shall be with you.

But I rejoiced <WG5463> in the Lord <WG2962> greatly, <WG3171> that now <WG2235> at last <WG4218> you have revived <WG330> your concern <WG5426> for me; indeed, <WG2532> you were concerned <WG5426> [before,] but you lacked <WG170> opportunity. <WG170>
Not that I speak <WG3004> from want; <WG5304> for I have learned <WG3129> to be content <WG842> in whatever <WG3739> circumstances <WG1722> I am. <WG1510>

I know <WG3609> how <WG3609> to get <WG5013> along <WG5013> with humble <WG5013> means, <WG5013> and I also <WG2532> know <WG3609> how <WG3609> to live <WG4052> in prosperity; <WG4052> in any <WG3956> and every <WG3956> circumstance <WG1722> I have learned <WG3453> the secret <WG3453> of being filled <WG5526> and going <WG3983> hungry, <WG3983> both <WG2532> of having <WG4052> abundance <WG4052> and suffering <WG5302> need. <WG5302>
I can <WG2480> do <WG2480> all <WG3956> things <WG3956> through <WG1722> Him who strengthens <WG1743> me.
Nevertheless, <WG4133> you have done <WG4160> well <WG2573> to share <WG4790> [with me] in my affliction. <WG2347>

And you yourselves <WG4771> also <WG2532> know, <WG3609> Philippians, <WG5374> that at the first <WG746> preaching <WG746> of the gospel, <WG2098> after <WG3753> I departed <WG1831> from Macedonia, <WG3109> no <WG3762> church <WG1577> shared <WG2841> with me in the matter <WG3056> of giving <WG1394> and receiving <WG3025> but you alone; <WG3441>
for even <WG2532> in Thessalonica <WG2332> you sent <WG3992> [a gift] more <WG2532> <WG1364> than <WG2532> once <WG530> for my needs. <WG5532>
Not that I seek <WG1934> the gift <WG1390> itself, but I seek <WG1934> for the profit <WG2590> which increases <WG4121> to your account. <WG3056>

But I have <WG568> received <WG568> everything <WG3956> in full, <WG568> and have <WG4052> an abundance; <WG4052> I am amply <WG4137> supplied, <WG4137> having received <WG1209> from Epaphroditus <WG1891> what you have sent, <WG3844> a fragrant <WG2175> aroma, <WG3744> an acceptable <WG1184> sacrifice, <WG2378> well-pleasing to God. <WG2316>
And my God <WG2316> shall supply <WG4137> all <WG3956> your needs <WG5532> according <WG2596> to His riches <WG4149> in glory <WG1391> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>
Now <WG1161> to our God <WG2316> and Father <WG3962> [be] the glory <WG1391> forever <WG165> and ever. <WG165> Amen. <WG281>
Greet <WG782> every <WG3956> saint <WG40> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424> The brethren <WG80> who are with me greet <WG782> you.
All <WG3956> the saints <WG40> greet <WG782> you, especially <WG3122> those <WG3588> of Caesar's household. <WG3614>
The grace <WG5485> of the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> be with your spirit. <WG4151>
